title: Popeye the sailor
abstract: I don't scare (1956, dir. I. Sparber)--Greek mirthology (1954, dir. Seymour Kneitel)--Cookin' with gags (1955, dir. I. Sparber)--Popeye meets Ali Baba's forty thieves (1937, dir. Dave Fleischer)--Big bad Sindbad (1952, dir. Seymour Kneitel)
description: A compilation of five animated cartoons featuring that famous spinach-eating hero Popeye the Sailor, along with the usual co-stars, his dearly beloved Olive Oyl, Bluto the interfering bully and Popeye's mischievous young nephews. Interesting to note that in "Popeye meets Ali Baba's forty thieves" there is a mix of real life background with the animation which apparently was often a feature of the very early Popeye cartoons. Good family entertainment.
